name: DuckDuckGo
description: The Internet privacy company that empowers you to seamlessly take control of your personal information online, without any tradeoffs.

name: Bing
description: Search with Microsoft Bing and use the power of AI to find information, explore webpages, images, videos, maps, and more. A smart search engine for the forever curious.

name: Debian
description: Debian is an operating system and a distribution of Free Software. It is maintained and updated through the work of many users who volunteer their time and effort.
